content:
pie title Phone Swap Request Feature Breakdown
  "UX Team" : 30%
  "Backend Team" : 25%
  "Frontend Team" : 20%
  "Product Manager" : 10%
  "Action Items" : 15%

note
  The pie chart represents the breakdown of tasks and responsibilities for the Phone Swap Request Feature.
  The UX Team is responsible for creating a wireframe of the modal and form, while the Backend Team will develop the new API endpoint and database schema.
  The Frontend Team will build the "Request Phone Swap" button and basic modal structure, and the Product Manager will create the formal Jira ticket with the defined user story and acceptance criteria.
  Action Items include creating wireframes by EOD October 17, developing the new API endpoint and database schema by October 21, building the "Request Phone Swap" button and basic modal structure once wireframes are approved, and creating the formal Jira ticket with the defined user story and acceptance criteria.

metadata.meeting_notes:
Phone Swap Request Feature
Date: October 14, 2025
Attendees: Product Manager, UX Designer, Lead Frontend Developer, Lead Backend Developer
Objective: Define the requirements and implementation plan fo
metadata.html_content:
🎨 Mermaid Diagram Visualization

📊 Interactive Diagram

This diagram is rendered using Mermaid.js and is fully interactive. You can zoom, pan, and interact with the elements.

pie title Phone Swap Request Feature Breakdown "UX Team" : 30% "Backend Team" : 25% "Frontend Team" : 20% "Product Manager" : 10% "Action Items" : 15% note The pie chart represents the breakdown of tasks and responsibilities for the Phone Swap Request Feature. The UX Team is responsible for creating a wireframe of the modal and form, while the Backend Team will develop the new API endpoint and database schema. The Frontend Team will build the "Request Phone Swap" button and basic modal structure, and the Product Manager will create the formal Jira ticket with the defined user story and acceptance criteria. Action Items include creating wireframes by EOD October 17, developing the new API endpoint and database schema by October 21, building the "Request Phone Swap" button and basic modal structure once wireframes are approved, and creating the formal Jira ticket with the defined user story and acceptance criteria.

🔧 Technical Details
